I've been looking for the "theme" icon at the bottom left every time I've been on since it was posted...no luck! Thought I was either blind or had a wacky computer glitch going on. Well, I found it...accidentally. On my computer, the words "change theme" and the background are the same colour! I scrolled over it with the mouse and it changed to white. Sneaky!! LOL
